Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Scolopendrasin VII (natural anti-cancer; other BAPs, myriapods, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; XXA; 1S=S; UCSS1a)

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence  shows poor similarity (34.8%) tofrog Temporin-1DRa. It showed anticancer activity against U937 and Jurkat leukemia cell lines. MOA: It probally induces necrotic cell death via interaction with phosphattudylserine (PS).
Literature Information.Author: Lee JH, Kim IW, Kim SH, Kim MA, Yun EY, Nam SH, Ahn MY, Kang DC, Hwang JS. 2015
Literature Information.Title: Anticancer activity of the antimicrobial peptide scolopendrasin VII derived from the centipede, Scolopendra subspinipes mutilans.
